name: Time to Stop
description:
Time to Stop is an experiment in 'controlling' time. In a world where your fate is determined, can you find the right opportunity? 

----

There are three levels to get through.

  1. The Gallery
  2. The Octagon
  3. The Theatre (level unfinished, only decorative)

The game will take at most a few minutes to get through. Unfortunately I did not have time to finish the final level.

----

Controls

 [W][A][S][D] Move player

[SHIFT] Hold to run

[Mouse] Move camera

[F] Freeze time

[R] Reset level

[P] Pause/un-pause game

[ESC] Exit game
